articles.content: Hiking among the many talus slopes in Glacier National Park, one might be so lucky to catch a glimpse at the elusive pika. The tiny member of the rabbit family is losing footing in similar habitats a… [+8168 chars]

articles.title: Cosmic Explorer: MIT's next-gen gravitational-wave detector - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Construction of a sizable detector capable of detecting gravitational-wave signals from events like the merging of black holes and neutron stars is underway.
articles.content: "The LIGO detectors are four kilometers long for each arm, and Cosmic Explorer will be 40 kilometers on a side, so 10 times larger. The signal we get from a gravitational wave is essentially proporti… [+1511 chars]

articles.title: Your Complete Travel Guide To October’s ‘Ring Of Fire’ Solar Eclipse - Forbes
articles.description: On Saturday, October 14, 2023 a "ring of fire" annular solar eclipse will be visible across the U.S. Southwest. It's time make a plan while you still can.
